dmca.title: DMCA Violation MMOTRICKS.com
dmca.body:
_____  

From: Tault Admin [mailto:admin@tault.com] 
Sent: Friday, February 24, 2006 10:46 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Re: DMCA Violation MMOTRICKS.com


 

----- Original Message ----- 
From: Tault Admin <mailto:admin@tault.com>  
To: Legal Response <mailto:legal-response2@theplanet.com>  
Sent: Friday, February 24, 2006 8:45 AM
Subject: Re: DMCA Violation MMOTRICKS.com

To whom it may concern
 
Here is a temporary account on the site taultunleashed llc.
 
theplanet / tault
 
Now what you need to do is check our all posts by their main admin by the
name of Nefertiti.  Every single post in the mmorpg is a direct copy and
paste from the site TaultUnleashed.  It is in clear regulations of the DMCA
as well.  
 
For example click to check out there SWG section.
 
Looks at all posts by thier admin nefertiti.
 
Then check out TaultUnleashed SWG Section.  Check out all members posts.
You can clearly match them up word for word as direct copy and pastes.
 
Here are a few
 
 <http://www.mmotricks.com/forums/showthread.php?t=5450>  SWG Exploit:
Cursed Shard Part1 Bug
SWG Exploits:  <http://www.taultunleashed.com/phpbb2/about29283.html> Cursed
Shard Part 1 Bug
 
 <http://www.mmotricks.com/forums/showthread.php?t=5447>  SWG Exploit: 100k
every 12 mins
SWG Cheats: 100k  <http://www.taultunleashed.com/phpbb2/about29505.html>
every 12 mins
 
 Now check out their WOW Section
 
 <http://www.mmotricks.com/forums/showthread.php?t=5446>  WoW Exploit: Fast
Runecloth for Level 55+
WOW Exploit:  <http://www.taultunleashed.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=29400>
Fast runecloth with mob exploit (lv55+)
 
 <http://www.mmotricks.com/forums/showthread.php?t=5441>  WoW Trick: BG Flag
Hiding Spot (Horde)
WOW  <http://www.taultunleashed.com/phpBB2/viewtopic.php?t=29625> Exploits:
Nice Hiding spot in BG (Horde)
 
This is a direct copyright violation.  We would prefer not taking this
company to court but if needed im sure we can supeona a ip matching for that
user on the site www.taultunleashed.com.  After matched it will show he had
a premium account and his access times where at the same time of this site.
Please take action now as it is proven they are stealing works constantly.
This is a DMCA violation.  We are fully aware we can take this company to
court and sue them for these actions but instead we prefer to save us both
money.  However if it comes to that we will be forced to.
 

----- Original Message ----- 
From: Legal Response <mailto:legal-response2@theplanet.com>  
To: admin@tault.com 
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 
Sent: Friday, February 24, 2006 8:07 AM
Subject: FW: DMCA Violation MMOTRICKS.com

To Whom It May Concern:

 

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the Digital
Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA"), as it does not identify (a) the
copyrighted work claimed to have been infringed and (b) the material that is
claimed to be infringing, and information reasonably sufficient to permit
the The Planet to locate the said material. 

 

 

Legal Response Team

THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.


  _____  

From: Tault Admin [mailto:admin@tault.com] 
Sent: Thursday, February 23, 2006 3:44 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: DMCA Violation MMOTRICKS.com



DMCA
 
TaultUnleashed LLC
3337 Kendall Lane
Waco, TX, 76705
February 22, 2006


The Planet

1333 Stemmons Freeway, 
Suite 110, 
Dallas, TX 75207
(214) 782-7800

Dear  copyright@theplanet.com


The copyrighted work at issue is the text that appears on
http://www.taultunleashed.com/phpbb2/index.php
Search Query: supremex.net
URL of Search Query: http://www.mmotricks.com/forums/
Infringing Web Pages: http://www.mmotricks.com/forums/
All Forum Topics By the User Nefertiti / Administrator of the site are
guides directly posted word from word from our pay site. The topics contain
information that is directly stolen from the website www.taultunleashed.com.
They are being illegally taken and posted by this user with full knowledge
of violation of our companys intellectual rights.

My Contact Information: admin@tault.com

Infringer's Contact Information: 
RegisterFly.com - Ref# 12407370
Whois Protection Service - ProtectFly.com (12407370.fly@spamfly.com)
+1.2122952121
Fax: +1.2122952153
230 Park Avenue
Suite 864
New York, NY 10169
US

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described
above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the
copyright owner, its agent, or the law.
I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification
is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on

Sincerely,
 


Nicholas Teagarden, Vice President
TaultUnleashed LLC
